Counter Strike Condition Zero basicamente es lo mismo que el Counter Strike 1.6:

-La jugabilidad es la misma que el CS 1.6.

-Los mismos personajes y mapas que el CS 1.6 pero solo con un cambio de texturas en HD (por asi decirlo).

-La comunidad de este juego es poca. Apenas encuentro servidores activos.

-Lo Ãºnico que encontre de bueno en este juego es el modo Tour. En que consiste esto, pues se trata de pasar cada mapa, dÃ¡ndote la libertad de elegir tu equipo, te darÃ¡n puntos de reputaciÃ³n cada vez que ganes un mapa, asi mejorando tu equipo. AdemÃ¡s de esto, al momento de jugarlo, tendrÃ¡s que lograr objetivos que te diga cada mapa, para asÃ­ desbloquear mÃ¡s mapas.

-Al comprar este juego, tendrÃ¡s el modo historia que serÃ­a "escenas eliminadas", la cuÃ¡l es muy bueno la verdad, lo Ãºnico que encontrÃ© de gracioso es la traducciÃ³n al espaÃ±ol, pero por lo menos se esforzaron en hacerlo.

Simplemente te lo recomiendo por el modo historia y el modo tour :)

Les serveurs sont quasiment tous vides, mais on trouve quand mÃªme une partie assez facilement sur les maps les plus connues. Pas de pyjamas qui hurlent au micro, moins sÃ©rieux que CSS dans le jeu (peu de joueurs jouent leur vie), plus fun et beaucoup moins de rageux.

Ce CS s'adresse aux joueurs adultes qui ne veulent pas se prendre la tÃªte avec les autres.

I missed most of the old games, especially this, since it was one of my favorites, something special that was marked in my life and in fact I spent many hours in it, in short, there are many things to say about this game along with The delivery of CS 1.6, are excellent games and no teenager should overlook it.

This game includes another expansion pack free, Counter-Strike: Condition zero Deleted scenes. I'll Review the main game first.

"Counter-Strike: Condition Zero" 5/10

CS:CZ Is a bot oriented game, And the bots are smart too. So exploit their tactics, It'll be a rinse & repeat if you die once.
But Overall, It's somewhat ok, It does have Exclusive maps to this game. So You could port it to CS 1.6.

"Counter-Strike: Condition Zero: Deleted Scenes" 9/10

CSCZDS. A Very long short version of the title, But I works. Or CZDS. But This is my Favorite.
CZDS Is a Campaign based version of CSCZ, And It's amazing, You should think of it as Half-Life. But here are my descriptions of the Diffuculties.

Easy: I Want to kick ass at my own pace.

Medium: A Euphemism for normal.

Hard: 1st Person hotline miami.

Also, There are soldiers with rockets too.
Thank you to the Develepors of CZDS For making this awesome expansion!! :steamhappy:

This review mainly applies to CS:CZ Deleted Scenes, as CS:CZ just adds bots and objectives like "Kill 3 enemies with a sniper rifle" and is generally alright.

As for Deleted Scenes: This is the most confused & confusing version of CS ever.

Walking through the training mission, everything starts out like you'd expect for a single player version of CS, standard M4A1 intro, AWP and grenades. Plus a RC wall explosive (why not...), a radio that you can only use in specific locations (which makes it more like a phone booth), a camera that follows the same rule, and a fiberoptic device to spy on people through keyholes (think Rainbow Six, but it only works on select doors).

Then the game starts, and it's a mess. A heavily stereotyped mix of guys in a white turban starts yelling in what sounds like Arabic and attacking you. Some of them are basically Psychos from Borderlands, attacking you with machetes. Others are snipers, but they first aim at you with a laser. You may be familiar with these concepts from literally no version of CS ever.
They go down like flies, as any good bad guy should, and then you get stuck because the level layout is fucking awful, 90% of doors don't open and of those that do, at least half lead to dead ends (after you've gunned down the enemies behind them). The first friendly "sniper" you meet then tries to melee enemies with his AWP and dies, failing the mission instantly.

This is not a good game. If you want a CS single player, play the regular CS:CZ or just add bots to any other version of CS.
